description: :::What's New::: Added more Birthday email backgrounds:::Don’t send plain, boring sms or email messages from your Palm Pre, Pixi smart phone! Send fully customized text with fun animated emoticons using SMS MMS Email Emoticon app:::This is a 6-in-1 app! Check it out:::1st: Over 5,500 animated emoticons, viewable on any smart phone, can be added to make your SMS messages fun to read.:::2nd: Use Dynamic SMS feature to send a colorful sms text messages with 30 fancy fonts and 460+ iPhone® emoji icons.:::3rd: Rich Text Email Editor similar to Microsoft Outlook® for text formatting. User can insert animated emoticons to email message, customize font with bold, italic, underline, strikethrough, subscript, or superscript, colors, and sizes:::4th: Best Email Stationery. Add a cool background to email messages to make them pop, compatible with multiple email clients. Many designs to choose from:::5th: Create SMS, MMS and Email templates to a database to streamline messaging, simply open, select saved template and send:::6th: Group options: Create Group Text/SMS and Group Email lists for fast messaging to a designated group. No more entering multiple recipients over and over!:::Not sure this app is really for you? Download the trial version and use it for 3 days free! Search Palm App Catalog for "Trial SMS MMS Email Emoticons":::Improtant Note:::If your friends using Android based phone and don't see animated images, then tell them to download & install Handcent SMS app (Free from the Android Market), it will solve the problem. iPhone users will receive your MMS animated emoticons ok
